synopsis.text: Nakamura, a solitary and peculiar classmate, witnesses Takao Kasuga, a bookish high school student, steal the gym uniform of his unrequited love, Saeki Nanako. In order to keep his secret safe, Nakamura coerces Kasuga into a twisted pact, exploiting his guilt and manipulating his life. As Kasuga becomes entangled in Nakamura's dark schemes, he struggles to maintain his distance from Saeki, fearing the exposure of his shameful secret. With his life spiraling out of control, Kasuga must navigate the treacherous path Nakamura has set for him, while attempting to redeem himself and protect those he cares about. In a world where darkness lurks within every heart, can Kasuga find the strength to break free from Nakamura's grasp and find his own path to redemption? Only time will tell in this gripping tale of obsession, guilt, and the search for self-forgiveness.
